      • accept

        public void accept(PsiElementVisitor visitor)

      • acceptIdempotentVisitor

        public void acceptIdempotentVisitor(PsiElementVisitor visitor)
        A drop-in replacement for accept(PsiElementVisitor) that invokes the visitor in a non-blocking cancellable read action, so that the visitor can be interrupted and restarted several times on the same file. The visitor must support this workflow, i.e. be idempotent.

      • accept
